009package ColorFilters;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.ColorStack;
018import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.ColorStack.ColorStackType;
019import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.GaussianFilter;
020import imagingbook.common.util.Enums;
021
022/**
023 * This plugin performs a Gaussian filter in a user-selectable color space.
024 * Demonstrates the use of a generic LinearFilter for Gaussian blurring 
025 * (brute force, not separated).
026 * @author W. Burger
027 * @version 2013/05/30
028 */
029public class Gaussian_Filter_Color implements PlugInFilter {
030        
031        static double sigma = 3.0;
032        static int nIterations = 1;
033        static ColorStackType csType = ColorStackType.sRGB;
034        
035        ImagePlus imp = null;
036        
037    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
038        this.imp = imp;
039        return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
040    }
041
042    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
043        if (!getParameters()) 
044                return;
045        ImagePlus colStack = ColorStack.createFrom(imp);
046        switch (csType) {
047                case Lab :      ColorStack.srgbToLab(colStack); break;
048                        case Luv:       ColorStack.srgbToLuv(colStack); break;
049                        case RGB:       ColorStack.srgbToRgb(colStack); break;
050                        case sRGB:      break;
051                default:
052                        IJ.error("Color space " + csType.name() + " not implemented!"); 
053                        return;
054        }
055        
056        FloatProcessor[] processors = ColorStack.getProcessors(colStack);
057        
058        for (int k = 0; k < nIterations; k++) {
059                for (FloatProcessor fp : processors) {
060                        new GaussianFilter(sigma).applyTo(fp);
061                        
062                }
063        }
064        
065        ColorStack.toSrgb(colStack);
066        colStack.setTitle(imp.getShortTitle() + "-filtered-" + csType.name());
067        ImagePlus result = ColorStack.toColorImage(colStack);
068        result.show();
069    }
070    
071    boolean getParameters() {
072        String[] colorChoices = Enums.getEnumNames(ColorStackType.class);
073                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Gaussian Filter");
074                gd.addChoice("Color space", colorChoices, csType.name());
075                gd.addNumericField("sigma", sigma, 1);
076                gd.addNumericField("iterations", nIterations, 0);
077                gd.showDialog();
078                if(gd.wasCanceled())
079                        return false;
080                sigma = gd.getNextNumber();
081                csType = ColorStackType.valueOf(gd.getNextChoice());
082                nIterations = (int)gd.getNextNumber();
083                if (nIterations < 1) nIterations = 1;
084                return true;
085    }
086
087}
088
